member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.RoundTransformation
member.summary: Pre-process. Round all transformations before combining.

member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.MarkAsStatic
member.summary: Post-process. Mark the combined mesh as static.

member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.DeleteAssetOnRevert
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a linked mesh asset should be deleted when reverting a combined group.

member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.Optimize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combined mesh should be optimized after combining.

member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.RecalculateNormals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the normals of the combined mesh should be recalculated after combining.

member.name: P:ch.sycoforge.Combine.Editor.EditorSettings.TranformToParentSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the mesh should be transformed back to the parents space. Note: This is only possible when there's only one common parent object.
